Plot: Sydney Bristow is an international spy recruited out of college and trained for espionage and self-defense.
Language: English, Bulgarian, Arabic, Cantonese, French, German, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Spanish, Thai, Ukrainian, Uzbek, Dutch
Title: Alias
Actors: Jennifer Garner, Ron Rifkin, Carl Lumbly, Kevin Weisman
Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 31 wins & 143 nominations.
